title: Cornerstone Building Lenders Sign Pact Ahead of Talks With Owner
description: A bloc of creditors of Cornerstone Building Brands Inc. plans to coordinate ahead of expected talks with its private equity owner Clayton Dubilier & Rice, aiming to increase the group’s leverage as the company’s performance weakens, people familiar with the matter said.
